Description: Grants the entity the ability to move across the map.
Allows the entity to be targeted and damaged by attacks.
Indicates the entity can cast spells or abilities.
Marks the entity as a primary game unit.
Marks the entity as a static structure.
Marks the entity as a unique, powerful hero unit.
Marks the entity as a static or destructible world object.
Marks the entity as defeated, awaiting cleanup.
